description: Add only flag that determines whether the service will allow updates. Set the flag to 1 for Add Only. Set the flag to 0  or null for preventing updates.

description: Contains all netting rule data based on the Request References or Request Criteria. The data returned is the current information as of the dates in the response filter, and does not include all historical information about the netting rule.
